radiographic_examinations.findings: Heterogeneous spiculated mass, approximately 2 cm in diameter, in the right breast, with thickening of the skin.
Large area of hyperechogenicity in the region of the palpable mass.

Dense breasts with marked enhancement, area of decreased attenuation (2 cm in diameter with spiculated borders) in the upper outer quadrant of the right breast, and low enhancement compared with adjacent breast parenchyma, suggestive of peripheral rim enhancement; possible second mass of 1.6 cm in diameter.
Additional, more anterior hypoechoic mass, 1.6 cm by 1.1 cm by 2 cm, in the upper outer quadrant, with irregular borders and increased vascular flow.

Extensive metabolic activity in the right breast and two small foci of activity in the right axilla, indicative of metastases to lymph nodes; subtle focus of increased metabolic activity involving the tip of the left scapula.

Marked enlargement of the right breast and thickening of the overlying skin; small right axillary lymph nodes (<1 cm), and a nonspecific nodule (2 mm) in the lower lobe of the left lung; mixed lucency and patchy sclerosis in the inferior tip of the right scapula.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple solid hepatic lesions (â‰¤1.6 cm in diameter), thought to be metastases.
Resolution of all hepatic lesions except for a single lesion in the left lobe.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Complete resolution of previous hepatic lesions.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) of the breasts
radiographic_examinations.findings: Irregular area of enhancement up to 5.4 cm in greatest dimension, extending from the upper outer quadrant to the upper inner quadrant of the right breast.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Residual tumor and inflammatory response to neoadjuvant therapy.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Extensive pleomorphic calcifications associated with a vague mass involving most of the upper outer quadrant of the right breast.
